languages.text: "Твое существование в этом мире, мон-кай, для меня мимолетно. Твоя жизнь вскоре истечет, а я как был задолго до тебя, так буду и после. Понимаешь? Я не стану утруждать себя ответами на вопросы того, кто вскоре навсегда растворится в этом мире".

traits.locale_text: "Твое существование в этом мире, мон-кай, для меня столь же мимолетно, как и любование распустившися бутоном. Твоя жизнь вскоре увянет, а я как был задолго до тебя, так буду и после. Понимаешь? Я не стану утруждать себя ответами на вопросы того, кто вскоре навсегда растворится в этом мире".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
languages.original_text: "Твое существование в этом мире, мон-кай, для меня мимолетно. Твоя жизнь вскоре истечет, а я как был задолго до тебя, так буду и после. Понимаешь? Я не стану утруждать себя ответами на вопросы того, кто вскоре навсегда растворится в этом мире".

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is as fleeting a thing for me as admiring a blossoming flower. Your life will soon fade, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is as fleeting a thing for me as admiring a blossoming flower. Your life will soon fade, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Tu existencia en este mundo, mon-keigh, es algo fugaz para mí. Tu vida no tardará en acabar, y yo, que ya estaba aquí mucho antes que tú, seguiré estándolo mucho después de tu muerte. ¿Lo entiendes? No me molestaré en responder las preguntas de alguien que pronto desaparecerá de este mundo».
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: «Tu existencia en este mundo, mon-keigh, es tan fugaz para mí como admirar un capullo en flor. Tu vida no tardará en llegar a su fin, y yo, que ya estaba aquí mucho antes que tú, seguiré estándolo mucho después de tu muerte. ¿Lo entiendes? No me molestaré en responder las preguntas de alguien que pronto desaparecerá de este mundo».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、現世のお前の存在は、私にとって一瞬なのだ。お前の命はやがて消え去り、ずっと前から存在する私は、お前が消えた後もここに残り続ける。分かるか？もうすぐこの世から永遠に消える者の問いに、私はわざわざ答えるつもりはない」
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ。お前がこの世に存在することは、私にとって咲き誇る花を愛でるのと同じくらい儚いことなのだ。お前の命はやがて消え去り、お前よりずっと前からここにいた私は、お前が消えた後もここに存在し続ける。分かるか？もうすぐこの世から永遠に消える者の問いに、私はわざわざ答えるつもりはない」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “对我来说，你的生命无比短暂，猴子。你的生命很快就会消逝，而早在你之前就存在于世的我，即便在你消失多年之后，也依然依旧存在。你明白吗？你很快就会从这个世界上彻底消失，我不愿浪费时间回答你的问题。”
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: “对我来说，你在这个世界上的存在，就像盛开的花朵一样短暂。你的生命很快就会消逝，而早在你之前就存在于世的我，即便在你消失多年之后，我也依然依旧存在。你明白吗？你很快就会从这个世界上消失，我不愿浪费时间回答你的问题。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Votre existence dans ce monde, mon-keigh, est par trop fugace à mes yeux. Votre vie ne tardera pas à s'éteindre et je serai là encore longtemps après vous, comme je suis là depuis longtemps avant vous. Comprenez-vous ? Je ne m'embêterai pas à répondre aux questions de quelqu'un qui disparaîtra bientôt de ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: « Votre existence dans ce monde, mon-keigh, est aussi fugace que l'avènement d'une fleur épanouie. Votre vie ne tardera pas à s'éteindre et je serai là encore longtemps après vous, comme je suis là depuis longtemps avant vous. Comprenez-vous ? Je ne m'embêterai pas à répondre aux questions de quelqu'un qui disparaîtra bientôt de ce monde. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Eure Existenz in dieser Welt, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist für mich flüchtig. Euer Leben wird bald enden, dann werde ich, der schon lange vor Euch hier war, noch ewig weiter hier sein. Versteht Ihr das? Ich werde mir nicht die Mühe machen, Fragen von jemandem zu beantworten, der schon bald für immer aus dieser Welt verschwinden wird."
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Existenz in dieser Welt, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist für mich flüchtig. Euer Leben wird bald enden, dann werde ich, der schon lange vor Euch hier war, noch ewig weiter hier sein. Versteht Ihr das? Ich werde mir nicht die Mühe machen, Fragen von jemandem zu beantworten, der schon bald für immer aus dieser Welt verschwinden wird."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, bu dünyadaki varlığın benim gözümde gelip geçici. Yakında günlerin sona erecek ama senden çok önce var olan ben, senden çok sonra da varlığımı sürdüreceğim. Anlıyor musun? Pek yakında ebediyen bu dünyadan yok olup gidecek birisinin sorularına cevap vermeye tenezzül etmem."
languages.original_text: "Your existence in this world, mon-keigh, is fleeting for me. Your life will soon expire, and I who was here long before you will be here long after you are gone. Do you understand? I will not bother to answer questions from someone who will soon forever dissolve in this world."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh, bu dünyadaki varlığın benim gözümde gelip geçici. Yakında günlerin sona erecek ve senden çok önce var olan ben, senden çok sonra da varlığımı sürdüreceğim. Beni anlıyor musun? Pek yakında bu dünyadan ebediyen yok olup gidecek birinin sorduğu sorulara cevap vermeye bile tenezzül etmem."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
